title: Total number of employees of the LVMH Group worldwide 2008 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Total number of employees. In total the number of data points it has is 12.
In general Total number of employees has rose over the Year.
Total number of employees is roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2015, and lastly slightly increasing from 2015 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest Total number of employees, of value 156000.0 was reached at Year 2019
The lowest Total number of employees, of value 77087.0 was reported at Year 2008
